resources.string:
Enter an IPv4 address into the provided boxes. 
 
 Enter the Mask used for the ip. 
 
 Press Calculate. 
 The subnet information will be printed into the text box.

IPv4 - IP Address 
 Subnet - Subdivision of an IP network 
 VLSM - Variable-Length Subnetting 
 CIDR - Classless Inter-Domain Routing
